actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-665.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 275 - 125 (Record Vote No: 75).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 7) to make permanent certain of the authorizations of appropriations under the National School Act and the Child Nutrition Act of 1963.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7 (child nutrition and school lunch program funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 7) to make permanent certain of the authorizations of appropriations under the National School Act and the Child Nutrition Act of 1963.
